name: ngration
description: Starter node.js project which implements secruity using Continuous Integration

scripts.nsp: echo '=> checking module security vulnerabilities' && nsp check
scripts.coverage: echo '=> generating coverage report' && istanbul cover _mocha
scripts.lint: echo '=> linting' && jshint --jslint-reporter *.js config/*.js public/js/*.js > jshint.xml
scripts.complexity: echo '=> checking code complexity' && gulp complex
scripts.jsinspect: echo '=> checking for copy/pasted code' && jsinspect *.js config/*.js public/js/*.js > pmd.xml
scripts.copied: echo '=> check for copy/pasted code' && gulp inspect > pmd.xml
scripts.build: echo '=> building' && npm test -s &&  npm run nsp -s && npm run complexity -s && npm run copied -s && npm run coverage -s && echo '=> building finished'
